full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement

**Notice Number**: WS3981229399-Doc3994258134
**Publication Date**: 2023-05-11
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-29T14:00:00

**Description**:
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) issues this task-based professional services (TSPS) requirement for support services in the collection and analysis of information, and the production of new research for the transformation of procurement on an "as and when required" basis. The project involves baseline and gap analysis on existing procurement studies, international benchmarking on government procurement, and research studies on strategic procurement topics.

**Eligibility**:
This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have been qualified under Tier 1 and under the following categories:

* 2.7 Needs Analysis and Research Consultant – Intermediate & Senior
* 2.10 Knowledge Management Consultant – Intermediate & Senior
* 3.7 Procurement Specialist - Senior

**Service Requirements**:
The successful supplier will be required to provide up to 8 resources for support services, including the collection and analysis of information, and the production of new research. The project will be completed on an "as and when required" basis.

**Contact Information**:
For more information on this requirement, please contact:

* Jeremy Gagne (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [jeremy.gagne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jeremy.gagne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
